column4: hi guys listen i have a question not regarding ubuntu... does anyone know of a utility that can be used to download all files of certain types from a website?
wget and httrack are worth considering, not sure how with the latter.
so if i for instance want to download all the *.txt files from a site, WGet can do it?
It's possible.  I think it requires the directory listing option to be enabled in the apache configuration, but if so, most likely yes.
